DatabaseOptions.Query: select distinct StartTime, Field08 as FirstName, Field09 as LastName, [Description] as SessionName FROM uvwFullSessionData WHERE fkshowid = 13637

select distinct StartTime, Field08 as FirstName, Field09 as LastName, CONCAT(format(StartTime, 'M/d/yyyy'), CONCAT(' - ', [Description])) AS SessionName from [atsOnlineSessions].[dbo].[uvwFullSessionData] where fkshowid = 13637

select distinct StartTime, Field08 as FirstName, Field09 as LastName, CONCAT(format(StartTime, 'M/d/yyyy'), CONCAT(' - ', REPLACE([Description], CHAR(10), ''))) AS SessionName from [atsOnlineSessions].[dbo].[uvwFullSessionData] where fkshowid = 12899
